[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@rushstack/ts-command-line](./ts-command-line.md) &gt; [CommandLineParameterBase](./ts-command-line.commandlineparameterbase.md) &gt; [scopedLongName](./ts-command-line.commandlineparameterbase.scopedlongname.md)

## CommandLineParameterBase.scopedLongName property

If a parameterScope is provided, returns the scope-prefixed long name of the flag, including double dashes, eg. "--scope:do-something". Otherwise undefined.

**Signature:**

```typescript
readonly scopedLongName: string | undefined;
```
